nodes.long_description:
# XRでさらにリアルで没入感を！ 

# Active Life is T-ON

# エピソード3 グアム シナリオアップデート🎉


# これでエピソード1、2、3がDLC区分なしで統合提供されます。

ホームページ : https://vr.tioncare.com/


ディスコード : https://discord.gg/h7SxDcVV7k


Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/@official_tion


ㅤ

# ティオンでしか体験できないカスタム運動プログラム！
- アドベンチャー、フィットネス、メディテーションの3つのコンセプトから構成される豊富なコンテンツの中で、お好みのコンテンツを選んで運動の楽しさをアップしましょう！
{909768707433310}


# ティオンフレンズと一緒に楽しむアドベンチャー！
- ティオンフレンズと共にシナリオとミッションをクリアしながら楽しむアドベンチャーモード！
- ランニング中心のアクティビティモードとターン制ステージモードで構成され、飽きずに楽しめ、運動効果もアップ！
{576322278109356}
{1044135914154610}

# パーソナルトレーナーのキキと一緒に高強度フィットネス！
- パーソナルトレーナーのキキのコーチングに従って楽しむフィットネスモード！
- ユーザーの体力測定結果に基づき、9種類の身体要因別に提供されるカスタム運動プログラムで怪我のリスクを減らし、より効率的なトレーニングが可能に！
{879341050979094}
{485477954513357}

# 心と体のリラックスを促すクールダウンメディテーション！
- 運動後のクールダウンストレッチと心のリラックスメディテーションを組み合わせたメディテーションモード！
- 夕焼け、海、焚き火などの美しい景観を背景に、段階別メディテーションの効果を体験し、心の平和を見つける旅に出てみましょう！
{603563292331516}
nodes.short_description:
ティオンフィットネスで体験する新しいヘルスケア！
ティオンケアのカスタム運動プログラムを、今XRでお楽しみください。

nodes.file_name: 2. 제품 페이지 본문에 게시될 피트니스 - 운동 프로그램 선택 이미지.png
3. 제품 페이지 본문에 게시될 헬스스톤 이미지.png

nodes.long_description:
# Now, anytime and anywhere
# Active Life is T-ON

ㅤ

# Episode 3 Guam Scenario Update 🎉
# Episodes 1, 2, and 3 are now available together as a unified experience, with no separate DLC!

ㅤ

# Website : https://vr.tioncare.com/
# Discord : https://discord.gg/h7SxDcVV7k
# Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/@official_tion




ㅤ
# Customized workout programs you can only experience at T-ON!
- Choose from a variety of content in three concepts, Adventure, Fitness, and Meditation to enhance your workout enjoyment with the content that suits you best!
{471515915482331}

# Adventure with T-ON Friends!
- Adventure mode where you enjoy clearing scenarios and missions with T-ON Friends!


- Comprising a running-focused Activity mode and a turn-based Stage mode, enjoy without boredom and boost your workout effectiveness!
{1009916523615167}
{3834557000192720}

# High-intensity fitness with your personal trainer, KIKI!
- Fitness mode enjoyed with coaching from your personal trainer, KIKI!
- Based on the user's fitness assessment results, the nine customized exercise programs for different physical factors reduce the risk of injury and make workouts more efficient!
{8264305883608389}
{473226985446786}

# Cool down meditation for the relaxation of body and mind!
- Meditation mode combining cool-down stretches and mindfulness relaxation after workouts! 
- Embark on a journey to find peace of mind, experiencing the effects of step-by-step meditation against beautiful backdrops such as sunsets, the sea, and campfires
{868676071769341}
nodes.short_description:
Experience Unique Healthcare with T-ON Fitness!
Now, enjoy T-ON Care's personalized exercise programs in XR

nodes.file_name: 2. 제품 페이지 본문에 게시될 피트니스 - 운동 프로그램 선택 이미지.png
3. 제품 페이지 본문에 게시될 헬스스톤 이미지.png

nodes.long_description:
# XR에서 더 실감나고 몰입되게! 
# Active Life is T-ON

ㅤ

# 에피소드 3 괌 시나리오 업데이트🎉
# 이제 에피소드 1, 2, 3가 DLC 구분없이 통합으로 제공됩니다
ㅤ
ㅤ
ㅤ
ㅤ
ㅤ



# 홈페이지 : https://vr.tioncare.com/
# 디스코드 : https://discord.gg/h7SxDcVV7k
# Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/@official_tion
ㅤ


# 티온에서만 경험할 수 있는 맞춤형 운동 프로그램!
- 어드벤처, 피트니스, 메디테이션으로 구성된 세 가지 컨셉의 다양한 콘텐츠 중 내 맘에 쏙 드는 콘텐츠를 선택하여 운동의 즐거움을 높여보세요!
{450756347772348}

# 티온프렌즈와 함께하는 어드벤처!
- 티온프렌즈와 함께 시나리오와 미션을 클리어해 가며 즐기는 어드벤처 모드!


- 러닝 중심의 액티비티 모드와 턴제 형식의 스테이지 모드로 구성되어 지루함 없이 즐기고 운동 효과는 UP!
{507450124957045}
{530955612682174}

# 퍼스널 트레이너 키키와 함께 고강도 피트니스!
- 퍼스널 트레이너 키키의 코칭에 따라 즐기는 피트니스 모드! 
- 사용자의 체력 측정 결과를 바탕으로 제공되는 9종 신체 요인별 맞춤 운동 프로그램으로 부상 위험은 줄이고 운동은 더욱 효율적이게!
{8424769864246615}
{506876868545229}


# 몸과 마음의 이완을 위한 쿨 다운 메디테이션!
- 운동 후 쿨 다운 스트레칭과 마음 이완 명상을 결합한 메디테이션 모드! 
- 노을, 바다, 모닥불 등 다양한 컨셉의 아름다운 경관을 배경으로 단계별 명상의 
효과를 경험하며 마음의 평화를 찾아가는 여정을 떠나보세요!
{1536340803954928}
nodes.short_description:
티온 피트니스에서 경험하는 색다른 헬스케어!
티온케어의 맞춤 운동 프로그램을 이제 XR에서 만나보세요

nodes.long_description:
▪ Adventure with T-ON Care
Your avatar syncs with you to exercise together.
Enjoy activity modes focused on running and turn-based stage modes according to the main scenario.

▪ Personalized Intensive Workout
Fitness
Fitness provides customized exercises by analyzing user exercise data collected through the avatar's personal training in the intensive workout mode.

▪ Healing Your Day
Meditation
Meditation offers visualized meditations that enhance relaxation and restfulness of the body after exercise.

▪ 15 Expert-Researched Exercise Movements
The 15 exercise movements included in the content are designed based on expert research.

▪ Say Goodbye to Boring Workouts,
Fun for Everyone, Young and Old
From T-ON Friends' dialogues to movement guides, rich BGM, and narration add to the fun of exercising.
nodes.short_description:
Experience Unique Healthcare at T-ON Fitness
Try T-ON Fitness's Personalized Workout Programs

Explore T-ON Fitness for a unique healthcare experience with our customized exercise programs designed just for you.

More Realistic and Immersive in VR
Active Life is T-ON Anytime, Anywhere

Experience a more realistic and immersive workout with T-ON in VR. With Active Life, T-ON is available to you anytime and anywhere.

Say Goodbye to Boring Workouts,
Fun for Everyone, Young and Old

nodes.change_log:
0.1.16 Version Update 📢 Hello, dear players! Thank you for your continuous love and enjoyment of our product. In this update, we have made the following changes: 
1. Supported Languages: Add Japanese (対応言語:日本語追加)

0.1.15 Version Update 📢 
Hello, dear players! Thank you for your continuous love and enjoyment of our product. 
In this update, we have made the following changes: 

1. Added age verification API

2. Updated IARC certification

0.1.14 Version Update 📢 
Hello, dear players! Thank you for your continuous love and enjoyment of our product. 
In this update, we have made the following changes: 

1. Bug fixes based on the November 1st release version

2. Fitness Results UI - Workout list modification
(Previously, the same exercise appeared 3 times in a row -> adjusted to display each exercise only once)

3. Fixed issue where users who have not played after purchasing the product could not access the profile scene
